pages.text: Sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo–Parvardigori cahonijon ast
[Parvardigoro] Tanho Turo meparastem va tanho az Tu jori mecuem
Moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat farmo [va hamvora soʙitqadam ʙigardon]
Rohi kasone [hamcun pajomʙaron, sahidon, rostgujon va nakukoron], ki ʙa onon ne'mat dodai va dar zumrai ƣazaʙsudagon [jahudijon] va gumrohon [masehijon] nestand
